nodes.text: At some point during the lockdown of the Anoat sector by the Galactic Empire, a battle was fought on the former Hutt jewel world of Mataou between the Empire and the resistance faction called the Uprising. The Imperials, having realized that the resistance had established a strong presence in the Hutt ruins of Mataou, sought to wipe them out.

This battle is a "Sector Battle," a game-wide event that earns the players powerful rewards and dictates the expansion of in-game content. The canonical outcome of a Sector Battle is not known, since it is determined by the players' involvement. However, the motives of the battle were addressed in the in-game description.
